game_description: Labyrinth Trap is the classic Labyrinth Maze game, where you move ball to the goal, avoiding all the obstructions and holes. It is very cool addictive game for kids, adults and every one. This Labyrinth Maze game has amazing graphics with wooden texture. Become the fastest player in the leaderboards! If you have any request (bug, feature, idea), let me know on the Discord channel: https://discord.gg/KXzvqxG
review_1: I would definitely buy more levels! I can't wait to see your new designs! Thanks so much! Great job, Devs! Your game played perfectly. No glitches, challenging boards, nice twists (moving targets and double boards). Leaves me wanting soooo much more, please! Will definitely purchase additional packs! Thank you!
review_2: Please please PLEASE add more levels. Don’t care if I have to pay for DLC, but 24 levels goes by too fast… great game. Perfect physics
review_3: Give this game a try, it's well worth the asking price. More content would be awesome, as there were a lot of ideas in this game that could be worked into more levels.
review_4: This is brilliant…great challenges as you make progress…graphics terrific. Mechanics all great…should not be buried away on app lab
review_5: Wonderfully crafted virtual labyrinths. (Lovely music too.)
